output:
Map {
File Sharing and Hosting {
  Create Account: Allow users to create an account with the application,
  Upload Files: Allow users to upload files to the application,
  Share Files: Allow users to share files with other users,
  Download Files: Allow users to download files from the application,
  Manage Files: Allow users to manage their files,
  Security: Ensure the security of the files,
  Storage: Provide storage for the files,
  Search: Allow users to search for files,
  Notifications: Send notifications to users when files are shared or downloaded,
  Support: Provide support for users.
}
}
